modShortDescription: Removes the cap on the amount of damage zombies take when falling from heights, so drop pits from older alphas are now a semi-valid form of defense.
modDescription:
Removes the cap on the amount of damage [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) take when falling from heights, so drop pits from older alphas are now a semi-valid form of defense.

This is a C# Mod (cannot be server only, EAC must be off!).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsHarmony/tree/main/KHA20-ZombieFallDamage)**

If you appreciate KhaineGBâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).
